      • setMessageDisplayerLinkText

        public static void setMessageDisplayerLinkText(java.lang.String linkText)
        Sets the link text on the message displayer.
        NOTE: The link will not be displayed if the handler for the link is not set.
        Parameters:
        linkText - The string to be set on the link. If the links text is void, then the link will not be shown. The text should be a proper string that should be used for a link. For example,
        <a>Mesasge to be Clicked</a>
        Prefix <a>Mesasge to be Clicked</a> Suffix;
        See Also:
        registerMessageDisplayerLinkHandler(YRCEventHandler, String)
